name: arm-thrust
caption: Arm Thrust

effect.full:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Hits 2â€“5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

flavorText:
The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm
thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.
